info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:46PM CDT until July 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NORTON...SHERIDAN...SOUTHERN DECATUR AND NORTHWESTERN GRAHAM COUNTIES... At 545 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Hoxie, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public reported 2 inch hail in Tasco at 530pm CT. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hoxie, Lenora, Selden, Morland, Dresden, Leoville and New Almelo. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
